Title: The Human Comedy
Cast: Mickey Rooney, Frank Morgan, James Craig, Marsha Hunt, Fay Bainter, Ray Collins, Van Johnson, Donna Reed, Jackie 'Butch' Jenkins, Dorothy Morris, John Craven, Ann Ayars, Mary Nash, Henry O'Neill, Katharine Alexander
Plot: Teenager Homer Macauley stays at home in small-town Ithaca to support his family, while his older brother Marcus prepares to go to war. Homer Macauley remains in a small town looking after his widowed mother and younger brother. Homer's older brother is fighting the war in Europe. Written by Anonymous
Keywords: small town, army, orphan, hurdles, telegraph office
Location: Clarence Brown Ranch - Las Virgenes Road, Calabasas, California, USA
Actors: Mickey Rooney, Frank Morgan, James Craig
Writer: William Saroyan (from the story by), Howard Estabrook (screen play)
Description: Directed by Clarence Brown.  With Mickey Rooney, Frank Morgan, James Craig, Marsha Hunt. Teenager Homer Macauley stays at home in small-town Ithaca to support his family, while his older brother Marcus prepares to go to war.
